front.title: IP multicasting and broadcasting extension for PPPoE Protocol

abstract.t: In the year following the publication of the PPPoE protocol much operational experience and customer feedback was gathered. One problem that access providers usually mention is that when PPPoE Server needs to send IP multicast packets or broadcast packets to PPPoE Clients in a same Ethernet, it has to send these packets to each PPPoE Client over each PPPoE link. Because the PPPoE Clients are all in a Ethernet, this multiplication of packets affects performance and wastes the net's resource.
